channel.title: ASX:BHP on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in ASX:BHP on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: BHP Banks on China Export Resilience and India Growth for Demand
item.description: China’s export resilience and policy support, together with strong growth in India, will underpin future commodity demand despite an uncertain global outlook, according to BHP Group Ltd.
